name: Pathogen (itch) (Jozy915)
description:
The predicted life of a microorganism is short. How long can you survive? In pathogen, you take control of a small strain of bacteria as you maintain your mass and fend of other viruses. Featuring a small skill tree, this short game follows a short life.

This is a submission for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 115 with the theme "Life is Short"
